title: Relybo Torches LED Super Bright Rechargeable, Flashlight 500000 Lumens XHM88 Torches Battery Powered, Led Torch Rechargeable, Powerful Torch Flash Light for Dog Walking Hiking Camping Emergency Gift
features: 【TORCHES LED SUPER BRIGHT 500000 LUMENS】The Relybo powerful torch equipped with 30W XHM88 led chip and its high light source density, strong stability and powerful penetration, which can easily penetrate atrocious dust and thick haze, especially fit for rainy and foggy days with low visibility. Its beam can illuminate 2600-square-foot area like gigantic walls of light or focus on objects 5000 feet away like ultra long light saber (focal point is round light spot, but not cross grid).

【RECHARGEABLE TORCH & LCD DIGITAL DISPLAY】The torches led super bright rechargeable with usb-c port，the led torch can be charged by car charger, computer or any USB outlet etc. The tactical torch features lcd digital display, you can clearly and visibly read the current remaining battery power at any time. It is a revolutionary innovation that other torch do not have. Also the super bright torch can output power to your phone for power outages or emergencies!

【5 MODES & ZOOMABLE】The A05 rechargeable torch feature 5 modes: high/ medium/ low/ strobe/ SOS. The strobe and SOS mode ensure that you are ready for emergencies. The low mode is excellent for searching in the dark in close quarters, reading books at night. High and medium modes are suitable for wide range lighting, such as your backyard and camping tent. In addition, stretch the head of the torches battery powered to get powerful long distance spotlight or high power wide range floodlight.

【DURABLE & INDESTRUCTIBLE】The tactical torch is constructed of durable aircraft-grade aluminum with a hardened anodized finish. High impact resistance and scratch resistant, able to withstand accidental drops of 20 FT, and even run over it with a truck weighting 20T, but still intact. Built-in high density seal rubber waterproof ring to effectively resist rain and snow. It has an adjustable torch clip that can be easily fixed on the belt, pocket and backpack. And won't roll on a flat surface.

【EXTRA UV SMALL TORCH】The powerful torch kit include a all-new upgraded 365nm uv torch with clip, only weighting 0.09lb and 3.6 inches long, perfect for pockets, knapsack and purses. The mini torch is zoomable and the tactical switch at the tail. Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals! And it is useful tool to detect pet urine and do a house deep cleaning.

【PACKAGE INCLUDED】Long press the middle switch for 3 seconds to turn it off. If turned on again, it will begin in high mode. It will allow you rapidly end the cycle of the 5 modes. The high power flashlight kit includes: 1pcs Relybo led flashlight, 1pcs rechargeable battery, 1pcs usb c cable, 1pcs lanyard, 1pcs torch holster, 1pcs mini uv torch , 1pcs aaa battery holder, 1pcs plastic tube, 1pcs manual, 1pcs gift box, 3pcs aaa batteries (as an emergency backup battery).
description: Product Description Having a good led rechargeable torch is arguably a necessity when it comes to daily life. Whether you're camping, sifting through the depths of your attic, seeing our way outdoors, or prepping for inclement weather, having a led torch rechargeable is a must. The super bright torch is equipped with a clip ( adjustable and detachable flashlight clip ) on the side, which can be fixed on the belt, backpack and pocket. This is a smart design, so it will not roll on a flat surface and slide. 30W XHM88 LED CHIP & CIRCULAR LIGHT COLUMN The A05 strong torch is fitted with a new upgraded 30W XHM88 chip, which can provide 500000 lumens strong light. Its high beam can easily illuminate 2600-square-foot area like gigantic walls of light or focus on objects 5000 feet away like ultra long light saber ( focal point is round light spot, but not cross grid ). By pulling and pushing the head of the powerful torch, the functions of wide rang floodlight torch and long distance spotlight torch are realized. ATTENTION: PLEASE AVOID DIRECT LIGHT TO YOUR EYES MINI UV TORCH Noctilucent revolutionary innovation: After turning off the A05 led torch, the light cup will be covered with blue fluorescence, which will continue to shine for 30 seconds, making it easy to find the torches led super bright in the dark night where you can't see your fingers. The powerful torch kit include a all-new upgraded 365nm uv torch with clip, only weighting 1.52oz and 3.54 inches long, perfect for pockets, knapsack and purses. The mini torch is zoomable and the tactical switch at the tail. Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals! And the small torch is useful tool to detect pet urine and do a house deep cleaning. WARNING: DO NOT DIRECTLY IRRADIATE THE EYES. 30W XHM88 LED CHIP The A05 high powered torch equippe with 30W XHM88 LED chip , provides 500000 lumens incredibly light. Its powerful beam can easily illuminate 2600-square-foot area like gigantic walls of light or focus on objects 5000 feet away like ultra long light saber ( focal point is round light spot, but not cross grid ). TYPE-C USB RECHARGEABLE TORCH The led torch rechargeable with the type-c port, can be charged by car charger, computer, usb wall charger etc. High powered supply capability and fast charging speed save charging time and improve service life. It can be plugged and unplugged in both directions, which is quite comfortable to use. Due to version discrepancies, the Apple USB-C cable may not be compatible with charging our torches. OFFICIAL RECOMMENDATION: Please use the original charging cable provided with the torch to charge it. USB POWER OUTPUT The usb rechargeable torch can be used to charge your phone in emergency! The output current reaches 1A, making charging faster and more stable. Super suitable to take the powerful torch for camping, hiking and traveling. LCD DIGITAL DISPLAY The ultra bright torch features lcd digital display, you can clearly and visibly read the current remaining battery power at any time. It is a epoch-making innovation that ordinary torch do not have. TORCH WITH CLIP The super bright torch is equipped with a adjustable detachable clip on the side, which allows the torch can be fixed on the belt, backpack and pocket. This is a smart design, so it will not roll on a flat surface and slide. IPX5 WATERPROOF FLASHLIGHT & DURABLE The flashlight torch is shockproof and scratch resistant, can withstand a drop of 20 feet, and even run over it with a truck weighing 20 tons, but it's still intact. Built-in high tension seal rubber waterproof ring to effectively resist rain and snow. Suitable for: military torch, army torch, police torch, security torch and self defence torch. WIDLY USE THE RELYBO A05 POWERFUL FLASHLIGHT IS SUITABLE FOR POLICE, FIREMAN, WALKING, WALKING DOG, CAMPING, HIKING, EMERGENCY, HOME USE, INDOOR USE, OUTDOOR USE AND POWER BACKUP. IMPRESSIVE GIFT As an impressive gift, the Relybo A05 flashlight torch is especially suitable for New Year, Valentine's Day, Easter Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Halloween Day, Christmas Day and other festivals.
